mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bavarian M1907/10 Taillenhaken
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A Taillenhaken is a waist hook sewn to the rear of a coat or tunic to keep the belt from sliding down. This hook is specific to uniforms produced for the Bavarian army M1907/10 Waffenrock. Nationality: German (Bavarian)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Germans
Bavarians
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
